name: nobloger
title: nobloger
desc: This project is a web application built using Astro, inspired by astro-nano, provide compatibility with notion.so.
article:
nobloger is

  • simple, llight-weight and elegant
  • using full static pages (deal with nested notion pages)
  • with easy deployment on github pages

if you are lazy, and you happen to use notion, annnnd likes such theme, it's your dog day.


either improvement or fork on this project is welcomed.

github.name: nobloger
github.description: a start template for notion.so, with the support of static pages generation provided by noblog.
